name: NestBeams
description: Executes 1-D nesting of beams into stocks based on a given stock catalog. Outputs a NestingResult that can be optionally passed to the BTLxWriter.

inputParameters.name: stock_catalog
inputParameters.description: List of Stock objects defining available stock lengths and profiles.

inputParameters.name: spacing
inputParameters.description: Spacing tolerance to account for cutting operations (kerf width, etc.)

inputParameters.name: fast
inputParameters.description: If True, uses a faster but less optimal nesting algorithm.

outputParameters.name: NestingResult
outputParameters.description: NestingResult object containing details of the nesting operation.

outputParameters.name: Summary
outputParameters.description: A human-readable summary of the nesting result.
